scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.build:all: npm run build && npm run build:server
scripts.build:all:win: npm run build:win && npm run build:server
scripts.model:init: python3 -m venv ./.model && .model/bin/pip install poetry==1.4.1 && .model/bin/poetry config virtualenvs.in-project true && npm run model:deps
scripts.model:watch: npm run model:init && nodemon -e py --watch model --exec ".model/bin/poetry run python model/app.py"
scripts.model: npm run model:init && npm run model:start
scripts.start: concurrently -c auto -n web,api,tsc "parcel web/index.html --no-cache" "npm run server:watch" "npm run build:watch"
scripts.start:all: PIPELINE_PROXY=true concurrently -c auto -n web,api,tsc,pipe "parcel web/index.html --no-cache" "npm run server:watch" "npm run build:watch" "npm run model:watch"
scripts.watch: concurrently -c auto -n web,tsc "parcel web/index.html --no-cache" "npm run build:watch"
scripts.start:cluster: concurrently -c auto -n web,api,tsc "parcel web/index.html --no-cache" "npm run server:watch" "npm run build:watch"
scripts.start:https: concurrently -c auto -n web,api,tsc "parcel web/index.html --no-cache --https" "npm run server:watch" "npm run build:watch"
scripts.start:debug: LOG_LEVEL=debug concurrently -c auto -n web,api,tsc "parcel web/index.html --no-cache" "npm run server:watch" "npm run build:watch"
scripts.start:public: concurrently -c auto -n web,api,lt "parcel watch web/index.html" "npm run server:watch" "npx lt --port 3001"
scripts.start:public:win: concurrently -c auto -n web,api,lt "parcel watch web/index.html" "npm run server:watch" "npx lt --local-host 127.0.0.1 --port 3001"
scripts.start:win: concurrently -c auto -n web,api,tsc "parcel web/index.html" "npm run server:watch" "npm run build:watch"
scripts.start:win:all: set PIPELINE_PROXY=true && concurrently -c auto -n web,api,tsc,pipe "parcel web/index.html" "npm run server:watch" "npm run build:watch" "npm run model:watch"
scripts.selfhost: npm run deps && npm run build:all && SELF_HOST=1 npm run server
scripts.selfhost:win: set "SELF_HOST=1" && npm run deps && npm run build:all && npm run server
scripts.start:debug:win: set LOG_LEVEL=debug && concurrently -c auto -n web,api,tsc "parcel web/index.html --no-cache" "npm run server:watch" "npm run build:watch"
scripts.checks: pnpm format && pnpm typecheck && pnpm test
